body.name: Magnetic Stove Top Shelf, 2 Pcs 15''-30'' Adjustable Shelf Above Stove, Kitchen Storage with Zero Installation, Non-Slip, Baffles All Around, Heat-Resistant Silicone - Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 mins
features: INSTANT KITCHEN STORAGE - Organize your kitchen in style with our stove top magnetic shelves! Keep essential cooking ingredients like salt, pepper, spices, and cooking oil within reach, and tidy up frequently used items.

MAGNETIC DESIGN - This magnetic spice shelf features six powerful magnets that securely hold it onto your kitchen stove without any installation needed. No drilling is required; It's also easier to remove for daily cleaning.

HEAT-RESISTANT - Made with sturdy silicone, this magnetic stove top shelf is resistant to oil and stains, and can be easily wiped clean with a kitchen towel or rinsed with tap water, or even dishwasher. It can withstand temperatures up to 500F, so you don't need to worry about high temperatures affecting your cooking essentials.
FALL PROTECTION - This magnetic stove top shelf has non-slip baffles and raised edges to prevent container from falling behind the stove. It offers more storage space for efficient stove or oven use.

FITS MOST STOVES - Magnetic kitchen storage shelf fits most stoves with adjustable length of 30". Suitable for most home stoves and fitting various container sizes. Perfect spice storage solutions for flat and slightly curved stove tops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Magnetic base holds firmly
reviews.reviewText: My wife loves it. Asked me why I hadn't ordered it sooner. Gives visibility to our spices instead of being hidden in our cabinet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Doyosh Magnetic Stove Top Shelf is just what I needed for my stove. For years I have always set items on my stove top back and would occasionally lose some to the land behind the stove. When I saw these I knew their being flexible would allow me to keep storing my Moka pot on my stove back. The shelves fit nicely and are a good quality. They are super easy to clean and hold the items I want neatly on the back of my stove without worrying they'll disappear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are great!The magnets on the back, stick great to the top edge of my stove.Their heavy duty silicone, that are easy to clean and create a nice extra storage space for spices or knickknacks! I love these!Great Value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this mat
reviews.reviewText: Accurate size, strong material, exactly as described, love how washable it is. Looks good makes my kitchen look more organized, has a lot of space, so you can put many spices and free up space from countertops. I like the lip in the front of them and the honeycomb finish inside.

Not "Expandable" in the sense of a range of size from 15-30". This is expandable in the sense that they give you two 15" trays. You cannot adjust the size, but merely add a second one. My stove has an electrical outlet on the top which doesn't allow two side by side, so we are stuck with one in the center only.The magnet in the base is strong enough to grip the top of the panel, and the tray sides are high enough to catch spills. Though the cutout in the front is narrow so if you don't have much overhead space, lifting salt or pepper mills, or taller dishes out makes a bit of a snag/spill issue unless you can tip them on their side or have the taller things in the center where the cutout is.Not a fantastic product or listing description.

reviews.reviewTitle: Looks fine but does not stay on securely
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have limited counter space in my kitchen, so I thought these would provide a great solution for storing my often-used spices, etc.There are two flexible silicone trays, which doesn't exactly provide an 'adjustable length,' but it does give you the option of either 15 inches of storage on top of your stove, or add the second one for another 15 inches. Both pieces fit on my stove.With magnets on the base, these are designed to 'fit perfectly on both flat and slightly curved stove top.' The idea is that even on a curve stove top, the magnets will keep it in place. This information is what I like to call wrong. Maybe if they were 'powerful magnets' as mentioned in the product information it would work that way, but I'd judge these aren't much stronger than the magnets you have on your fridge. It does not take much at all to slip them off my metal stove. I certainly wouldn't put anything heavy or spillable up there because it would only be a matter of time before they fell off and made a mess.Overall I'm disappointed with these. I don't feel the magnets in the base are strong enough to secure them to the top of my stove, and I would not trust them with much on them. I would not order them again.
